title: 路径总和 (Path Sum)
content: 思路: // @Title: 路径总和 (Path Sum) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-09-15 17:29:16 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 42.1 MB // @comment: // @flag: /** * Definition for a binary tree node. * public class TreeNode { * int val; * TreeNode left; * TreeNode right; * TreeNode() {} * TreeNode(int val) { this.val = val; } * TreeNode(int val, TreeNode left, TreeNode right) { * this.val = val; * this.left = left; * this.right = right; * } * } */ class Solution { public boolean hasPathSum(TreeNode root, int targetSum) { if(root!=null){ if(root.left==null&&root.right==null&&root.val==targetSum){ return true; } return hasPathSum(root.left,targetSum-root.val)||hasPathSum(root.right,targetSum-root.val); } return false; } }
